title: 1887 Kalamazoo Bats N690 Charlie Mason for Sale / Trade -- Price Drop 9/24 to $950!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: 1887 Kalamazoo Bats N690 Charlie Mason for Sale / Trade -- Price Drop 9/24 to $950!!
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous, sharp photo of Mason in street-clothes.  Exceptionally rare 19th century set.  Front of the card is in EXMT with a sharp photo and sharp corners.  The back however, is unfortunately skinned.

Hoping to trade for n300 Mayo's (any player).  Thanks in advance!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=575603&d=1686797155[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=575604&d=1686797168[/IMG]

Still available!  Probably value it in the $1200-1500 range but can be flexible, especially when trading.  Still looking for 1895 Mayos and e107s in particular.  Thanks much!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Bump....dropping the price to $1100 delivered.  Thanks much!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

One more bump.....down to $950. Open to cash or a mixture of cash/trade offers for any prewar card of value.

Thanks in advance!!

Brian
